video_prompt: Anime girl slowly floats against a cosmic backdrop. Her multi-toned hair gently sways. Her flowing blue gown billows around her, responding to subtle shifts. Luminescent particles orbit her. A glowing ring undulates beneath her feet, expanding and contracting. Soft light subtly pulses from below, highlighting her form and the dress's movement.
image_prompt: Anime celestial goddess, full shot, flowing blue gown, bob-cut light brown hair with blue/purple tips, closed eyes, cosmic background, sparkling glitter/stars, ethereal lighting from below, luminous ring under feet.
refined_video_prompt: Her hair gently sways. Her flowing gown billows and shifts with unseen currents. Luminescent particles orbit and drift around her. A glowing ring beneath her feet continually undulates, expanding and contracting. Soft light pulses from below, dynamically highlighting her form and the fabric's movement as she slowly ascends against a subtly swirling cosmic backdrop.
